reviewText:
This is what i get every time i try to open game and havent been able to fix. The forums have people with same problem but no fix yet. Feel ripped off.

reviewText:
5min of gameplay (check my channel for a full run with no commentary)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=I9xvHcaDVxk

Moorhuhn finds a treasure map to a hidden" castles (there are road signs in levels) so him and his friends go check it out.
The game's not hard and your goal is just to get to the end of a level with no bosses.
there are 4 kinds of levels where you'll control Moorhuhn on foot or sometimes riding a friend.
When he's on foot he has a mallet
recommended: & can double jump.\nWhen you pull out the gun (don't ask where he keeps this) you can shoot anything in sight but walk slow.\nRiding moorfrog you can double jump or grab coins with his tongue
hoursPlayed: here you'll be jumping on lily pads & logs where some will move or sink.\nWater slide levels you'll be riding moorturtle
voteText: and he can dash or jump as levels are just avoiding obstacles.\nMoorram can jump or dash to break wood fences
helpfulPercent:
these are similar to the turtle levels.
Since the original was made to promote whisky i think the target audience was kids and their drunk dads.

Co-op is a split screen mode where you can play the ram or turtle levels with a friend on the same keyboards.

Moorhuhn was 1st an advertisement for Johnnie Walker whisky in 1999. the game's objective was to shoot down
votesTotal: as many cartoonish "swamp chickens" (German: Moorh√ºhner; literally "moorhens"
votesFunny: i.e. willow ptarmigans) as possible in 90 seconds."

reviewText: Bad, just bad game not worth even few cents
